item.title: Profile load
item.description: Challenge Solution In this challenge, you are presented with a code that involves the logic for retrieving and displaying the user’s profile based on user controllable parameter. Your task is to identify any vulnerabilities present in the code. import java.io.IOException; import javax.servlet.ServletException; import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet; import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest; import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse; import java.sql.Connection; import java.sql.DriverManager; import java.sql.PreparedStatement; import java.sql.ResultSet; import java.sql.SQLException; public class CheckProfile extends HttpServlet { protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException { String requestedUserId = request.
